chapters.title: Chapter 27:  A Call to Stand
chapters.info: Faiselle, p. 432—Sitter in the Hall of the Tower of Salidar. She disapproved of Egwene being raised Amyrlin. She sat with Lelaine's Sitters in the divided Tower. She is stocky, and has coppery skin and a square face. She grew up in Arad Doman. She was involved in the negotiations with Elaida.
